title: Increased P of complement decreases beef demand

content.question: Which of the following will decrease the demand for beef?

choices.label: An increase in the price of pork, if pork and beef are substitute goods
An increase in the price of potatoes, if potatoes and beef are complementary goods
A decrease in the cost of transporting beef to consumers
An increase in the income levels of most consumers, if beef is a normal good
Research showing beef is better for your health than chicken

content.answer: An increase in the price of potatoes, if potatoes and beef are complementary goods

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
